attributes.action: Advise the IOC that Britain is no longer prepared to host the 2012 Olymic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The £9-Billion estimated cost of hosting the 2012 Olympics is COMPLETELY out of proportion to any benefit the country might realise from them, and we should therefore advise the International Olympic Committee that they need to find another venue for the games because we prefer to spend the money on things that will be of greater value to the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
